title: Switzerland - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport (issued within the last 10 years and valid for at least 3 months beyond return date)
Completed and signed visa application form
Clear purpose of travel with supporting documents (tourism, visit, etc.)
Proof of financial means (bank statements of last 6 months)
Proof of strong ties to Bangladesh (employment, education, family, property)
Confirmed hotel bookings or invitation letter from Swiss host
Travel insurance covering at least €30,000 for the Schengen area

details.title: Required Documents
items: Passport + photocopy of data page and all previous passports
Cover letter explaining purpose of travel
Personal bank statement (last 6 months) and TIN certificate
Employment letter and salary slips (last 3 months), or trade license and tax documents if self-employed
Student ID and institutional letter if a student
Hotel reservation for entire trip and day-by-day travel itinerary
Civil status documents: marriage, divorce, birth, or death certificates if applicable
Parental consent and passport copy (for minors if one or both parents are not traveling)
Leave letter from employer in Bangladesh (mentioning position and leave approval)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
